parameters.name: BackupPlanId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup schedule. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain it.

parameters.name: BeginTimestampForRestore
parameters.description: The earliest point in time to which you can restore data. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of the parameter for each backup schedule.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: EndTimestampForRestore
parameters.description: The latest point in time to which you can restore data. You can call the [DescribeBackupPlanList](~~2869825~~) operation to obtain the value of the parameter for each backup schedule.

parameters.name: RecentlyRestore
parameters.description: Specifies whether to query the most recent point in time to which you can restore data.
